title: Conrad Murray Trial Begins - 2011 | Today In History | 27 Sept 17
description:
On September 27, 2011, opening statements in the Los Angeles trial of Michael Jackson’s personal physician, Dr. Conrad Murray, took place as prosecutors accused Murray of killing the superstar through irresponsible use of the anesthetic propofol, and the defense maintaining Jackson had caused his own death. (Murray was later convicted of felony involuntary manslaughter.) 

You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/50660f450c08c3d93bbe2f24fe8f53aa 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
